name: Sales Invoice Item Wise
query:
SELECT 
    `tabSales Invoice`.name AS 'Name',
    `tabSales Invoice`.customer AS 'Customer',
    `tabSales Invoice`.customer_name AS 'Customer Name',
    `tabSales Invoice`.territory AS 'Region',
    `tabSales Invoice`.company AS 'Company',
    `tabSales Invoice`.posting_date AS 'Posting Date',
    `tabSales Invoice`.posting_time AS 'Posting Time',
    `tabSales Invoice`.status AS 'Status',
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.item_name AS 'Item Name',
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.qty AS 'Quantity',
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.rate AS 'Rate',
    `tabSales Invoice Item`.amount AS 'Amount'
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice`
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` ON `tabSales Invoice Item`.parent = `tabSales Invoice`.name
WHERE 
    DATE(`tabSales Invoice`.posting_date) >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
    AND `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus = 1
    AND `tabSales Invoice`.company IN ('Unit 6', 'Unit 5', 'Unit 5B', 'Unit 15', 'Unit 8');
